summary: Completed e2e testing of SoundDrops MVP - Music sample marketplace. All backend API tests passed (14/14). Frontend loads correctly with all required features verified.

integration_issues.issue: Two admin pages exist: /admin (old simplified version) and /admin-dashboard (full version with all features). The /admin route uses Admin.js which lacks ZIP support, Featured/Sync toggles. The /admin-dashboard route uses AdminDashboard.js with all features.

action_items: Consider consolidating admin pages - either update /admin route to use AdminDashboard.js or remove the duplicate Admin.js file
The navbar 'Admin' link should point to /admin-dashboard instead of /admin to access full features
critical_code_review_comments: Two admin components exist (Admin.js and AdminDashboard.js) - potential confusion and maintenance overhead
Admin.js at /admin lacks ZIP support, Featured/Sync toggles that are present in AdminDashboard.js at /admin-dashboard
ObjectId serialization fix is properly implemented with serialize_doc() function
seed_data_creation: Created admin user session and creator user session for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs all working. Two admin pages exist - /admin (simplified) and /admin-dashboard (full features). Creator dashboard at /creator works with all features. Stripe payments are MOCKED using test keys.

features_verified.api_health_check: PASS - GET /api/ returns SoundDrops API v1.0
features_verified.list_samples: PASS - GET /api/samples returns empty array without errors
features_verified.admin_dashboard_full: PASS - /admin-dashboard loads with all tabs (Overview, Creator Management, Content Management, Email Collection, Payment Settings, Upload Pack)
features_verified.admin_upload_form: PASS - Has ZIP support, Featured toggle, Sync Ready toggle, BPM/Key fields
features_verified.creator_dashboard: PASS - /creator loads with stats and Upload Pack button
features_verified.creator_upload_modal: PASS - Has ZIP support, Featured toggle, Sync Ready toggle
features_verified.content_management: PASS - Shows 'No sample packs uploaded yet' (expected - no packs exist)
features_verified.objectid_serialization: PASS - No ObjectId errors in API responses

mocked_apis.stripe_payments: Using test keys (sk_test_emergent) - payments are in test mode
